posts.author: trees65

posts.title: IF YOU ARE VOTING IN PERSON ON TUESDAY, HERE'S THE DRILL PATRIOTS!
posts.content:
FIRST: If you have to work on Tuesday, forget it. CALL IN SICK if possible. Especially if you are in any swing sate. Do NOT limit the time it might take you to stand in line to VOTE. Voting for TRUMP on TUESDAY is more important at this point.

SECOND: Plan to spend an entire day waiting to VOTE. There will be nothing short of pure F**KERY at polling locations nationwide in an attempt to stop you from voting. Water leaks, power outages, malfunctioning machines, lazy poll workers, and dozens of other possible issues. Especially in all Swing States including Virginia, New Hampshire, Minnesota and New Mexico too. No matter how long it takes you must stay in line and VOTE for TRUMP. Every vote matters this time around.

THIRD: Bring SUPPLIES for a long day in line. Snacks, food, water, drinks, chairs, coats, hats, umbrellas and even wear depends if you can take a piss while having to wait all day to vote if needed. I will literally just piss my pants all day if that what it takes.

Fourth: Do not be intimidated by anyone that works at the polling place or claims to work at a polling place that you can not vote for any reason if you enter the line before the time the polls close. It is your constitutional right to be able to vote.

FIFTH: TODAY, MONDAY write down and have the phone number(s) of your local Sheriff, local Republican Reps, Scott Pressler in Pennsylvania, or anyone else that can assist in making sure you are able to VOTE on Tuesday and have these phone numbers or contact info on hand when you leave to go vote on TUESDAY. Also check to see how many locations you may be able to use to cast your VOTE. The bigger the city the more polling places there are to vote. Make a full list of every location you can vote at and look them up on the internet maps and screen shot every location and write down the locations on paper to have in case you need to go to another polling station.

SIXTH: Plan to get to your polling station as soon as they open the doors. Parking could be an issue, walking may be required after you park, the earlier you get there the easier it will be to get the VOTE in. If you are unfamiliar with the area the polling place is located a drive by today could not hurt to have a plan in place.

SEVENTH: Vote TOGETHER with family and friends. A long wait is much more easier with family and friends to converse with while you wait. If any of your family or friends are on the fence about voting, make sure they come with you to ensure they get it done. Offer to drive anyone you may know that could need a ride to the polling station to make sure they get there to VOTE.

EIGHTH: Bring your own BLACK FELT TIP PEN, NO SHARPIES if your voting system requires you fill out the ballot yourself and not a touchscreen. DO NOT USE A SHARPIE if they are only providing sharpies to fill out ballots. ONLY USE A BLACK FELT TIP PEN.

NINTH: DO NOT LEAVE YOUR BALLOT IN ANY PROVISIONAL BOX TO BE TALLIED LATER. It will NOT BE or they will run through BS adjudication where not only will your vote not be counted but they will flip it to Kamala. If they say there are issues with ballots being read by scanners or anything else that they say you "CAN LEAVE IT IN A PROVISIONAL BOX TO BE ADDED OR COUNTED LATER" cancel the ballot and get back in line to vote again until the system is working and your ballot is accepted with a receipt if possible.

TENTH: if you were mailed a MAIL IN BALLOT be sure to bring that ballot to the polling place with you so you can prove you did not VOTE YET. Hopefully you did not open it and it is still sealed in the mailer envelope. If they claim you already voted by mail. Leave the polling station, re-enter the line before poll closing time, and call the local sheriff to report FRAUD and give them the address of the polling place to come and deal with it. DO NOT confront the polling staff or election officials if this happens. CALL The POLICE or SHERIFF or anyone on your contact list to rectify the situation first and have them help you.

ELEVENTH: Charge your phone to 100%, bring a power brick that is fully charged and connection cord to keep your phone charged all day.

TWELTH: If you need readers bring your GLASSES and inspect your ballot before you submit to be counted. If it is touchscreen and they print the ballot from on screen be sure to INSPECT the ballot or receipt that is printed to make sure it is CORRECT and no flipping occurred before it is submitted to be counted. After you inspect or check your ballot-receipt take photos of it with your phone.

THIRTEENTH: Maintain your MANNERS while you wait or dealing with any issues at a polling location with staff or other voters. DO NOT WEAR ANY MAGA OR TRUMP GEAR. Show your support with your VOTE. Wearing any MAGA-TRUMP gear will only cause trouble.

I am sure there are many other things to do that I have not addressed in this post so please fellow PATRIOTS add to this list in the COMMENTS.

ALSO forward this information to everyone you know, post it on social media and get this info out to everyone in every way possible that is not on this website.

THIS IS IT PATRIOTS. We have them on the ropes right now after early voting. You see what is going on in Georgia already and other swing states. They are going to cheat in any way possible and you have to be ready. If we all VOTE, TRUMP WINS. This not only needs to be too big to rig, but beyond too big to rig. They simply do not CARE. Nothing was done in 2020 and nothing will this time if we do not VOTE and make this a total landslide. we need to guard against all cheating they have planned and overwhelming the vote for Trump is the only thing we have left. We have to be ready and we have to VOTE, VOTE, VOTE. Remember if we lose and the party is over for this country. The United states will cease to exist if Trump does not win, and he will win if we all vote. By 2028 30-40 million immigrants will be legalized citizens and there will never be another free and fair election. We will be embroiled in World War 3, Communism will be the norm and your freedoms and the freedom of your children will be gone forever.

PLEASE MODS STICKY THIS POST. PLEASE, PLEASE, PLEASE and everyone SHARE, SHARE, SHARE this information. I plan to post it all day here in hopes for a sticky. God Bless all of you and God Bless Donald Trump.
posts.raw_content:
FIRST: If you have to work on Tuesday, forget it. CALL IN SICK if possible.  Especially if you are in any swing sate.  Do NOT limit the time it might take you to stand in line to VOTE. Voting for TRUMP on TUESDAY is more important at this point. 


SECOND:  Plan to spend an entire day waiting to VOTE.  There will be nothing short of pure F**KERY at polling locations nationwide in an attempt to stop you from voting. Water leaks, power outages, malfunctioning machines, lazy poll workers, and dozens of other possible issues.  Especially in all Swing States including Virginia, New Hampshire, Minnesota and New Mexico too.  No matter how long it takes you must stay in line and VOTE for TRUMP.  Every vote matters this time around.  


THIRD:  Bring SUPPLIES for a long day in line.  Snacks, food, water, drinks, chairs, coats, hats, umbrellas and even wear depends if you can take a piss while having to wait all day to vote if needed. I will literally just piss my pants all day if that what it takes.


Fourth: Do not be intimidated by anyone that works at the polling place or claims to work at a polling place that you can not vote for any reason if you enter the line before the time the polls close. It is your constitutional right to be able to vote.


FIFTH: TODAY, MONDAY write down and have the phone number(s) of your local Sheriff, local Republican Reps, Scott Pressler in Pennsylvania, or anyone else that can assist in making sure you are able to VOTE on Tuesday and have these phone numbers or contact info on hand when you leave to go vote on TUESDAY. Also check to see how many locations you may be able to use to cast your VOTE. The bigger the city the more polling places there are to vote.  Make a full list of every location you can vote at and look them up on the internet maps and screen shot every location and write down the locations on paper to have in case you need to go to another polling station.


SIXTH: Plan to get to your polling station as soon as they open the doors.  Parking could be an issue, walking may be required after you park, the earlier you get there the easier it will be to get the VOTE in.  If you are unfamiliar with the area the polling place is located a drive by today could not hurt to have a plan in place.  


SEVENTH: Vote TOGETHER with family and friends. A long wait is much more easier with family and friends to converse with while you wait.  If any of your family or friends are on the fence about voting, make sure they come with you to ensure they get it done.  Offer to drive anyone you may know that could need a ride to the polling station to make sure they get there to VOTE. 


EIGHTH: Bring your own BLACK FELT TIP PEN, NO SHARPIES if your voting system requires you fill out the ballot yourself and not a touchscreen.  DO NOT USE A SHARPIE if they are only providing sharpies to fill out ballots.  ONLY USE A BLACK FELT TIP PEN. 


NINTH: DO NOT LEAVE YOUR BALLOT IN ANY PROVISIONAL BOX TO BE TALLIED LATER.  It will NOT BE or they will run through BS adjudication where not only will your vote not be counted but they will flip it to Kamala.  If they say there are issues with ballots being read by scanners or anything else that they say you "CAN LEAVE IT IN A PROVISIONAL BOX TO BE ADDED OR COUNTED LATER" cancel the ballot and get back in line to vote again until the system is working and your ballot is accepted with a receipt if possible. 


TENTH: if you were mailed a MAIL IN BALLOT be sure to bring that ballot to the polling place with you so you can prove you did not VOTE YET.  Hopefully you did not open it and it is still sealed in the mailer envelope.  If they claim you already voted by mail.  Leave the polling station, re-enter the line before poll closing time, and call the local sheriff to report FRAUD and give them the address of the polling place to come and deal with it.  DO NOT confront the polling staff or election officials if this happens.  CALL The POLICE or SHERIFF or anyone on your contact list to rectify the situation first and have them help you.  


ELEVENTH: Charge your phone to 100%, bring a power brick that is fully charged and connection cord to keep your phone charged all day.


TWELTH: If you need readers bring your GLASSES and inspect your ballot before you submit to be counted.  If it is touchscreen and they print the ballot from on screen be sure to INSPECT the ballot or receipt that is printed to make sure it is CORRECT and no flipping occurred before it is submitted to be counted. After you inspect or check your ballot-receipt take photos of it with your phone.


THIRTEENTH: Maintain your MANNERS while you wait or dealing with any issues at a polling location with staff or other voters.  DO NOT WEAR ANY MAGA OR TRUMP GEAR.  Show your support with your VOTE.  Wearing any MAGA-TRUMP gear will only cause trouble.  


I am sure there are many other things to do that I have not addressed in this post so please fellow PATRIOTS add to this list in the COMMENTS.

ALSO forward this information to everyone you know, post it on social media and get this info out to everyone in every way possible that is not on this website.

THIS IS IT PATRIOTS.  We have them on the ropes right now after early voting.  You see what is going on in Georgia already and other swing states.  They are going to cheat in any way possible and you have to be ready.  If we all VOTE, TRUMP WINS.  This not only needs to be too big to rig, but beyond too big to rig.  They simply do not CARE.  Nothing was done in 2020 and nothing will this time if we do not VOTE and make this a total landslide.  we need to guard against all cheating they have planned and overwhelming the vote for Trump is the only thing we have left. We have to be ready and we have to VOTE, VOTE, VOTE.  Remember if we lose and the party is over for this country.  The United states will cease to exist if Trump does not win, and he will win if we all vote. By 2028 30-40 million immigrants will be legalized citizens and there will never be another free and fair election.  We will be embroiled in World War 3, Communism will be the norm and your freedoms and the freedom of your children will be gone forever.   

PLEASE MODS STICKY THIS POST.  PLEASE, PLEASE, PLEASE and everyone SHARE, SHARE, SHARE this information. I plan to post it all day here in hopes for a sticky.  God Bless all of you and God Bless Donald Trump.
